channel.title: libvirt on SoByte
channel.description: Recent content in libvirt on SoByte

item.title: libvirt Principles and Practices
item.description: Libvirt is a set of open source software tools developed by Redhat. The goal is to provide a common and stable software library to manage virtual machines on a node efficiently and securely, and to support remote operations. Libvirt shields different virtualization implementations and provides a unified management interface. Users only care about the high-level functions, and the implementation details of VMM should be transparent to end users. libvirt then
